cs.CV, cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.IR. 

The paper deals with scene text recognition, which is a computer vision problem, hence it is likely to belong to the cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition) category. The paper also mentions an attention mechanism, which is a common technique in natural language processing (NLP), hence it could also belong to the cs.CL (Computation and Language) category. The paper proposes a new model for scene text recognition, which involves deep learning techniques, hence it could also belong to the cs.LG (Machine Learning) category. The paper also involves semantic segmentation, which is a common technique in computer vision, hence it could also belong to the cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) category. Finally, the paper involves text recognition, which is a common problem in information retrieval, hence it could also belong to the cs.IR (Information Retrieval) category.
